> [kaffie](#comment_359_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): AntiFa is pretty legit. They do good work. I mean, how you can you not like a group that's against fascists?

Because they slander large groups as people as fascist, often based on their own prejudices. I can't wait to watch your tactics backfire as every self-respecting white guy get's tired of your crap.  Too bad you're busy "bashing" people in the interests of international capitalism. 

People demanding self-determination for their own communities have more legitimacy, than those who punch "racists".
